title: SAIL chairman Amarendu Prakash says keenly watching Chinese steel imports post US tariff hikes
description: SAIL continues to buy steelmaking coking coal from Russia at 75,000 tons per ship, he added.SAIL chairman Amarendu Prakash says keenly watching Chinese steel imports post US tariff hikes
content: Steel Authority of India is keenly watching steel imports following tariff increases on China by the United States, its chairman Amarendu Prakash said on Friday. SAIL continues to buy steelmaking coking coal from Russia at 75,000 tons per ship, he added.
cleaned_content: steel authority of india is keenly watching steel imports following tariff increases on china by the united states its chairman amarendu prakash said on friday sail continues to buy steelmaking coking coal from russia at <SEVEN_TEN_THOUSAND> tons per ship he added
